title: Guilford Courthouse National Military Park: Weather
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Weather              Weather         Ice Storm at Guilford Courthouse National Military Park               Summers are warm to hot and humid with the occasional thunderstorm.  Spring and Fall are cool with rainy periods.  Winter is mild and cold with snow and ice possible in January and February.  Wear comfortable clothing for the season and good walking shoes year round! When planning your trip, click here to see the future forecast.
